const response = await client.search({
  index: "shirts",
  query: {
    bool: {
      filter: {
        term: {
          brand: "gucci",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    colors: {
      terms: {
        field: "color",
      },
    },
    color_red: {
      filter: {
        term: {
          color: "red",
        },
      },
      aggs: {
        models: {
          terms: {
            field: "model",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  post_filter: {
    term: {
      color: "red",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
